name: 3D FPS Mario?
description:
This is just a fangame made for fun, all rights are reserverd to Nintendo Co. Ltd.

The idea was to remake the very first level of the original Super Mario Bros but in 3D and FPS. Hope you like it.

MAKING OF:

How to Start the game

*Download the .zip file

*Right click, and unzip

*Open "3D FPS Mario.exe" to run the game
